Product description

Style:Low Voltage Bracket  |  Size:1 Pack

Product Description

Arlington LV1-1CS Low Voltage Mounting Bracket, 1-Gang, Black, 1-Pack. Mounting bracket has Oval holes that allow final shifting and straightening. Easy to install, for mounting low voltage wires(phone, internet, TV, video). Adjusts to fit various wall thickness, the bracket wings secure when mounting screws are tightened. Bracket is its own template for cut-out, trace the bracket then cut the hole, includes 1 low voltage mounting brackets. Horizontal or vertical mounting, installs faster and costs less than metal brackets, UL/CSA Listed. Protects cable as it runs through the knockouts in metal studs.

From the Manufacturer

Arlington LV1-1CS Single Gang Low Voltage Device. Arlington's non-metallic, LV1-1CS, Low Voltage Mounting Brackets are the time and money-saving solution for faster and easier mounting of Class 2 communications, computer and cable TV wiring. The bracket is its own template. Level the bracket on the wall. Then use the bracket a s a guide for the cut out by tracing a line around the inside. Arlington fittings are carefully inspected and our manufacturing process is designed to prevent the possibility of a defective product leaving our plant. In the event any of our products are found to be defective, we will replace them with new product free of charge. The time limit for this warranty is one year following the date of sale or one year after the date of installation, whichever is the earlier date. This warranty does not apply when the product is used for any purpose other than the intended use as described in the Arlington literature. This warranty does not apply when the product is used for any installation which would violate the national electrical code or any code which takes precedence in a particular jurisdiction. Labor is not included.

Top customer reviews

There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later.

4.0 out of 5 starsThe pawls are nice and large tighten easily but there isn't any stop ...
ByDreamcatcherDBon April 17, 2017
Style: Low Voltage Bracket|Size: 1 Pack|Verified Purchase
It did the trick for one install but was quite flimsy feeling and overly flexible. The pawls are nice and large tighten easily but there isn't any stop preventing the pawls from swinging back into the work opening before they are tight. Not too bad as I could still reach through and hold the pawls until they began gripping the sheetrock but certainly made installing around pre pulled wires a bit more cumbersome. Very long screws and stops for thick walls (plaster, I suppose) but simply too long for standard 1/2" drywall and they tend to get in the way when working from the back side (in the attic). Packaged individually with instructions seems a bit too much. Not the worst but certainly not the best either.

5.0 out of 5 starsEasy install! I ended removing my wall mounted phone ...
ByR Fon December 30, 2016
Style: w/ Brush Cover + Wall Plate (1-Gang)|Size: 1 Pack|Verified Purchase
Easy install! I ended removing my wall mounted phone jack and replaced it with this to run some security camera wires so I did not have to cut my drywall. If you have to make a hole, make sure you use the mounting bracket as a template to determine how big of a hole you have to make (used the inside of the plate to mark the wall then cut). I am sure I will be buying more in the future and therefore recommend it.

4.0 out of 5 starsSecures plate to drywall pretty well.
ByXavierColeon July 27, 2017
Style: Low Voltage Bracket|Size: 1 Pack|Verified Purchase
I purchased this to use as a mount for GE 87697 Single Brush Wall Plate (Plastic) when running HDMI cable in a wall. I had a specific place I needed it to go that was not near a wall stud. I did not feel it was necessary to install a plate with HDMI keystones in that location as I have in others. Regardless, installation was pretty easy with a drywall saw. The plate is secure to the wall and we have not experienced any slippage. Overall, a good product.

Style: w/ Wall Plate (1-Gang)|Size: 2 Pack|Verified Purchase
The low voltage bracket obstructs the opening in the wall plate. Home depot brackets work better with the wall plates than the brackets provided, which is just silly. Who works QA for this company?
Other than that it's an OK product, the wall plate has an outer lip that doesn't match anything else I've seen but in my application the plates are hidden anyway.

5.0 out of 5 starsFantastic brackets, makes the job so much easier
ByRyan Josephon August 2, 2016
Style: Low Voltage Bracket|Size: 10 Pack|Verified Purchase
These are great brackets and absolutely essential for running low voltage wires through walls. It makes running speaker wire, network cable, security camera cable, etc. SO MUCH EASIER. These work similar to those blue "existing work" outlet boxes you may have used for electrical projects, but they're totally open on the back without the box part. The box is required for higher voltage electric lines, but not for low voltage applications such as Ethernet cable.

So you simply cut a hole in the wall, slide the bracket in, and then as you tighten the screws, those little clamps fold out and tighten against the drywall, holding the bracket in place. You then have a nice and clean rectangle hole in the wall for running cables, and the bracket has standard sized screw holds for cover plates.

Trust me, if you're doing any kind of low voltage wiring inside walls, you need these brackets, it helps SO much. Brackets like this cost about $1.30-$1.50 at the big home improvement stores, so buying a ten pack here definitely saves some money.
Read more

5.0 out of 5 starseasy to install and fits tightly in the wall
Bymcali17on October 11, 2017
Style: Low Voltage Bracket|Size: 1 Pack|Verified Purchase
This is a repeat purchase for me. This mounting bracket is high quality, easy to install and fits tightly in the wall. Install trick, flip the bracket over against the wall and trace the inside. Remove from the wall and then square off the trace from the widest part. Then just cut to the outside of the "largest" opening and its a perfect fit.
